p: The RBS experimental and simulated curves of the NiO MS-OAD are displayed in Figure 2a. RBS confirms the homogeneous distribution of nickel and oxygen atoms throughout the whole filmâ€™s thickness and the completely oxidized state of nickel, i.e., NiO. This is also confirmed by the Ni2p photoelectron spectrum of the as-prepared sample ( Figure 2b), depicting a shape characteristic of this compound [ 34].
